review: Fantastic, easy setup. Watching TV shows, commercial free. The music and picture storage plus Prime free shipping, great package.
author: Paul White

review: It's great to be able to watch my prime movies, TV episodes, etc. on my TV screen. One of the best purchases I have made.
author: Janice  Zambrano

review: I loved the fire stick from the moment I took it out of the box. It could not possibly have been any easier to install or use. I absolutely love the program selection as well as the searchability. I purchased a Roku for my father in law and set it up for him and this was far easier. Don't get me wrong, I liked the Roku, but I'm more impressed with the Amazon fire stick.
author: Kasie DeLap

review: Great piece of tech, and one of the first plug and play items that actually worked as advertised.  Very much looking forward to binge-watching Bosch, and Longmire and whatever the next big thing that comes along might be.
author: Vintage Valley Girl

review: love it..easy to set up and very easy to use with remote!
author: kathy

review: Works great for our family! Kids love using this to access you tube to play all of there favorite TV shows.
author: Earnest Epps

review: Easy to use! Wish there was a larger movie selection.
author: Lacy Tanneberg
